tasks.title: Implement Authentication
tasks.description: Create login and registration functionality with JWT tokens. Need to handle both email/password authentication and social login options.

tasks.title: Design Database Schema
tasks.description: Design and implement the database schema for the task management system including users, tasks, and project tables.

tasks.title: Setup CI/CD Pipeline
tasks.description: Configure continuous integration and deployment pipeline using GitHub Actions for automated testing and deployment.

tasks.title: Write Unit Tests
tasks.description: Write comprehensive unit tests for all components and utilities. Aim for at least 80% code coverage.

tasks.title: Optimize Performance
tasks.description: Analyze and optimize application performance. Focus on reducing bundle size and improving load times.

tasks.title: Update Documentation
tasks.description: Update project documentation including README, API docs, and user guides.
